page.title: 17TECHNOLOGY
page.content:
ON T.V.E.I WE VISIT CERTAIN PLACES,USE BBC COMPUTERS,ELECTRONIC TYPEWRITERS,WE LEARN ABOUT BANKS AND CHECK CARDS,HOW TO SURVIVE WHEN WE LEAVE SCHOOL.ON THE VISITS WE WENT TO THE {BEDFORD HOTEL,NEWHAVEN INDUSTRIAL {SITES AND THE NATIONAL LIFEBOAT {INSTISTUTION.}WE ALSO WENT TO THE COLLAGE OF TECHNOLGY FOR A WEEK AND DID CERTAIN THINGS SUCH AS COMPUTING, PAINTING AND DECORATING,ELECTRICAL INSTALLING,MOTOR VEHICLE TESTING,CATERING,HORTICULTURE AND AGRICULTURE.
{BY MARK KELLY AND {MATTHEW HERRIOTT.
